item.title: Understanding OCI Image Spec
item.description: As part of understanding the OCI image spec, I found that a good explanation of the image spec will help others. Explaining a few things here, which I found a little bit difficult to grasp while reading the spec. Image Format The spec defines an OCI image. This image spec is almost similar to Docker V2.2 image schema format. Image services like containerd can pull this image, and then create a bundle (more on this as I learn about it).
